name: yet-another-pinboard-extension
description: Browser extension for pinboard (including omnibar search and actionbar button popup)

scripts.copytodist: rmdir /S /Q .\dist & mkdir .\dist\vendor\webextension-polyfill & mkdir .\dist\js & mkdir .\dist\html && mkdir .\dist\css & mkdir .\dist\img & copy .\node_modules\webextension-polyfill\dist\*.min.js* .\dist\vendor\webextension-polyfill & copy .\src\img\*.* .\dist\img & copy .\src\html\*.* .\dist\html & copy .\src\css\*.* .\dist\css & copy .\src\manifest.json .\dist\manifest.json
scripts.copyandbuild: npm run copytodist && npm run lint && npm run tsc
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run tsc

author: seeba8
